name: Incubation Period
description:
Incubation Period is about a scientist guarding a foetus which will soon become a superhuman. Until that happens, he needs to guard it from demons invading the lab.

This is a game I made for GM48 a while back. It's also my first game made for a game jam in under 48 hours. I hope you enjoy!

Instructions
  • Menu
    • Navigate with arrow keys
    • Press enter on one of the options
    • Press Escape to exit
  • Movement
    • Right: D
    • Left: A
    • Jump: Spacebar
    • Shoot: Left-click
    • Grenade: Right-click
